title: BIP 28: Badger Grants Program
body:
TLDR; Introduce for discussion and refinement the proposed initial parameters for the grants program. Ultimately, to establish how Badger will move forward in accepting, vetting, and approving proposals for grants.

Pushing forth 4 grant types:
1) Ecosystem
2) Governance
3) Community
4) Referral

Discussions: https://forum.badger.finance/t/bip-28-badger-grants-program/2380
author: 0xa001B5639e4ed26dF58367016eB08850e3e55655
